name: Sage & Apple & Cranberry Stuffing
description: Subtle sage and fall apple are the perfect flavour pairing for cozy winter dinners.
preparation: Boil celery for 3 minutes in Broth.
In a large mixing bowl, combine bread, apple, and Sage & Apple Stuffing Seasoning.
Pour Broth mixture over bread mixture, and stir to combine.
In a large, lightly buttered casserole dish, bake until golden, approximately 25 minutes.
tips: Prep and freeze up to 3 weeks ahead, then bake in a large casserole dish to serve on the side.
Add 1 cup dried sweet cranberries to your stuffing for that extra sweet and savoury kick! Serve with chicken, turkey, or pork.

To make a half batch, in Rectangular Steamer, steam half the celery with 1⁄2 cup prepared Broth. Transfer to a heat-proof serving dish. Mix in 1⁄2 cup Broth and half all remaining ingredients. Bake, and serve: fewer dishes, less mess!
Compared to store-bought, Epicure Sage & Apple Stuffing could save you almost 700 mg of sodium per cup! Enjoy this traditional dish knowing you are serving something both delicious and healthy.
